programme.title: European Football Show 2024 -25
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τις σημαντικότερες αναμετρήσεις των κορυφαίων ευρωπαϊκών πρωταθλημάτων.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Sporting Countdowns
programme.desc: Δείτε ένα επεισόδιο της σειράς Sporting Countdowns.

programme.title: Serie A Full Impact 2024-25
programme.desc: Ένα μαγκαζίνο αφιερωμένο στο ιταλικό πρωτάθλημα. Παρουσιάζει συνεντεύξεις με παίκτες, στιγμιότυπα και προεπισκοπήσεις από τα επερχόμενα παιχνίδια.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Σεντ Γκάλεν - Φιορεντίνα

programme.desc: NBA 2024-25. Κανονική Διάρκεια. Η 79η σεζόν ξεκινά στις 22 Οκτωβρίου 2024 και τελειώνει στις 13 Απριλίου 2025. Το NBA σχεδιάζει να διοργανώσει ένα τουρνουά εντός της σεζόν για δεύτερη συνεχόμενη χρονιά. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Φιλέρης.

programme.title: NBA Specials: Basketball Stories
programme.desc: Ένα ντοκιμαντέρ για την καριέρα του Τζορτζ Γκέρβιν, κορυφαίου σκόρερ στο ΝΒΑ. Γνωστός για το στυλ του, επηρέασε πολλούς αθλητές κατά τη διάρκεια της εποχής του αλλά και μετέπειτα.

programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Παναθηναϊκός - Τσέλσι
programme.desc: UEFA Conference League 2024-25. League Phase, 2η Αγωνιστική. Η 3η τη τάξει διασυλλογική διοργάνωση στην Ευρώπη διεξάγεται με νέο φορμάτ και 36 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων. Ο τελικός θα γίνει στο Βρότσλαβ της Πολωνίας. Περιγραφή: Κώστας Ψάρρας.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies
programme.desc: Στιγμιότυπα. Από τη F1 έως την υψηλή κατάδυση και ένα σωρό άλλα extreme sports, κάθε εκπομπή παρουσιάζει και αναδεικνύει μέσα από 5 βίντεο μερικές από τις πιο απίστευτες στιγμές, διοργανώσεις και αθλητές σε όλα τα σπορ δράσης.

programme.title: Εκπομπή Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή για όλες τις εξελίξεις στα πρωταθλήματα μηχανοκίνητου αθλητισμού που φιλοξενεί η COSMΟΤΕ TV (F1, MotoGP, WRC, FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS, Formula E).

programme.title: MotoGP 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Qatar Airways Australian Motorcycle Grand Prix. Το MotoGP, το παγκόσμιο πρωτάθλημα μοτοσυκλέτας, προσφέρει πολλές συγκινήσεις. Παρακολουθήστε μια συμπυκνωμένη εκδοχή όσων συνέβησαν σε μια από τις κούρσες του 2024.

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto3 2024
programme.desc: PT Grand Prix of Thailand - Ελεύθερες Δοκιμές. Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto3 2024 περιλαμβάνει 15 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές και συνολικά 28 αναβάτες. Ο νικητής κρίνεται από 21 Γκραν Πρι που διεξάγονται μεταξύ 10ης Μαρτίου και 17ης Νοεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: ERC 2024
programme.desc: Με χρονιά εκκίνησης το 1953, το Ευρωπαϊκό Πρωτάθλημα Ράλι της FIA γίνεται 72 ετών το 2024 με ένα πρόγραμμα γύρων που διεξάγεται σε άσφαλτο και χαλίκι. Πρόκειται για το απόλυτο πεδίο προπόνησης για τα νέα ταλέντα που στοχεύουν στην κορυφή του αθλήματος. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Μάριος Παπαδόπουλος.

programme.title: ERC 2024

programme.title: Motorsports: Moto3 2024
programme.desc: PT Grand Prix of Thailand - 2ες Δοκιμές. Το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα FIM Moto3 2024 περιλαμβάνει 15 ομάδες από 5 κατασκευαστές και συνολικά 28 αναβάτες. Ο νικητής κρίνεται από 21 Γκραν Πρι που διεξάγονται μεταξύ 10ης Μαρτίου και 17ης Νοεμβρίου. Περιγραφή: Θανάσης Κελάφης.

programme.title: Τένις: ATP 500 2024
programme.desc: Βιέννη. Κυρίως ταμπλό. Τα τουρνουά ATP 500 ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών. Η σειρά αυτή αποτελείται από 13 τουρνουά, με τον νικητή σε καθένα από αυτά να λαμβάνει 500 πόντους κατάταξης. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: ATP Masters 1000 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP 1000, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Sailing to the Games 2024
programme.desc: Ακολουθήστε ιστιοπλόους από όλο τον κόσμο καθώς προετοιμάζονται να αγωνιστούν στη μεγαλύτερη αθλητική σκηνή του κόσμου.

programme.desc: NBA 2024-25. Κανονική Διάρκεια. Η 79η σεζόν ξεκινά στις 22 Οκτωβρίου 2024 και τελειώνει στις 13 Απριλίου 2025. Το NBA σχεδιάζει να διοργανώσει ένα τουρνουά εντός της σεζόν για δεύτερη συνεχόμενη χρονιά.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: Heart of the Holidays
programme.desc: Career-driven Sam returns to her hometown for the holidays, where she comes face-to-face with her high school boyfriend, Noah. Together, they rediscover what matters most in life.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Sara prefers to be on the sidelines at work until someone steals her big idea for a Christmas initiative. She makes a wish to Santa to gain the courage to stand up for herself, and he gives her 48 hours to discover how to speak her own mind.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to organize the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: A Magical Christmas Village
programme.desc: A woman tells her young granddaughter, Chloe, that her miniature Christmas village can magically grant holiday wishes. As Chloe begins setting up the figurines, real-life events seem to mimic the scenes she creates.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: Flipping for Christmas
programme.desc: It's almost Christmas when busy realtor Abigail agrees to help her sister with the simple flip of a recently inherited home. Unfortunately, co-beneficiary Bo has other plans in mind.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Two best friends crash Christmas parties and unexpectedly find love and purpose.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: Noel Next Door
programme.desc: A single mother gets into a war of words with an irritable neighbor who is ruining Christmas, only to find that this misunderstood Grinch is the man who has stolen her heart.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: Operation Nutcracker
programme.desc: When an antique nutcracker set to be auctioned at the Warby family Christmas charity goes missing, a demanding event planner and the heir to the Warby dynasty try to track it down.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: Take Me Back for Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas wish grants Renée the successful life she's always dreamed of -- except she finds herself no longer married to her beloved husband.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: An executive examines her company's new property and prepares a presentation to transform the rustic lodge into a new hot spot. She tries to ignore the lodge's festive celebrations during her stay, but an unexpected romance changes her heart.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner finds romance with a handsome local after traveling to a remote town in Alaska to find a rare flower for a celebrity client.

programme.title: Christmas Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: When Danielle's husband goes missing in action during his deployment, she's left to raise her daughter on her own. Three years later, as she acclimates to life without him, she begins to tell her daughter bedtime stories about her father.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman spends her time working in her mother's antique shop in a small ski village. One day she meets a man who makes her wonder if she should have left town and followed her dreams.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: A military widow whose faith in Christmas has lapsed rents an apartment to a soldier who is recovering from an injury in battle. When they team up to save the town's military museum, these two wounded birds find themselves falling in love.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a woman falls for the son of a developer who wants to tear down the wharf that is home to her toy store.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom Jacobs has built a business around helping clients find the perfect gift for their loved ones. When he's hired to find a gift for his friend's girlfriend, he finds himself in a bit of trouble: The more he researches her, the more he likes her.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: While planning an annual Christmas party, Peyton is forced together with Ben to care for a friend's daughter.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two strangers, a businesswoman and a country music star, are both booked on a flight to Tulsa before the holidays, but it ends up getting canceled due to a snowstorm. They decide to try to get to Tulsa together, and share their secrets along the way.

programme.title: Cherished Memories: A Gift to Remember 2
programme.desc: As Darcy and Aiden prepare to celebrate their second Christmas together, an unexpected guest and a fight to save the beloved community center unites everyone for an unforgettable holiday.

programme.title: Basketball Stories: 2000 Slam Dunk Contest- 20th Anniversary
programme.desc: A look back at Vince Carter's performance in the 2000 Slam Dunk Contest.
